description:
Powerful multimedia player that supports a variety of different video codecs and formats.


+ Added the ability to adjust playback speed when pressing the mouse button
- Fixed an issue where certain MPEG TS playback times were abnormal
- Fixed the problem of screen breaking when playing certain MPEG TS
- Fixed the problem of certain ASS/SSA subtitles appearing strangely
- Fixed an issue that caused abnormal operation when playing very long files.
